item.title: AKASHA Project | Co-creating The Language of Freedom
item.description:
AKASHA Project | Co-creating The Language of Freedom

With AKASHA your thoughts and ideas will echo throughout humanity's existence, thanks to a new kind of planetary-scale information network immune to censorship by design. After all, it's not information that wants to be free - it's us.

item.title: The Top Ten Emerging Technologies - World Economic Forum - Guess which technology comes in at #3 * /r/Bitcoin
item.description:
The Top Ten Emerging Technologies - World Economic Forum - Guess which technology comes in at #3 * /r/Bitcoin

Bitcoin is the currency of the Internet: a distributed, worldwide, decentralized digital money. Unlike traditional currencies such as dollars, bitcoins are issued and managed without any central authority whatsoever: there is no government, company, or bank in charge of Bitcoin. As such, it is more resistant to wild inflation and corrupt banks.

item.title: ICO Terms
item.description:
ICO Terms

Stratis ICO Information for investors Summary: Blockchain-as-a-service - flexible, off-the-peg ledger deployment Blockchain or Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT) offers a radically different paradigm of storing and managing information online.

item.title: Waves
item.description:
Waves

WAVES is a decentralized platform ​that uses custom blockchain tokens to represent value. Tokens can be issued by any platform user, ​and can be transferred, swapped, and traded ​on​ an integrated decentralized exchange. Tokens may represent a share in a crowdfunding project, financial instrument, ​or any other ​item​ with inherent value.

item.title: Plutus.it
item.description:
Plutus.it

Not enough merchants accept bitcoin. That's the crux of the problem, right? Most merchants have been slow to get on board making it difficult to spend Bitcoin on daily expenses. That's why Plutus was born. Like you, we simply wanted to make life's everyday purchases with Bitcoin - without having to think twice about it.
